SELECT d.NOTICE_ID as noticeId, d.NOTICE_TITLE as noticeTitle, d.NOTICE_CONTENT as noticeContent, d.STATUS as status, d.CREATE_BY as createBy, d.CREATE_TIME as createTime, d.UPDATE_BY as updateBy, d.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from sys_platform_notice d
d.STATUS = '0'
ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT d.NOTICE_ID as noticeId, d.NOTICE_TITLE as noticeTitle, d.DEPT_ID as deptId, t.DEPT_NAME as deptName, d.VISIT_DATE as visitDate, d.VISIT_PERIOD as visitPeriod, d.DOCTOR_SPECIAL as doctorSpecial, d.DOCTOR_TYPE as doctorType, d.STATUS as status, d.CREATE_BY as createBy, d.CREATE_TIME as createTime, d.UPDATE_BY as updateBy, d.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from sys_suspend_notice d,sys_dept t
d.STATUS = '0' and d.dept_id = t.dept_id
ORDER BY createTime DESC
